description.value: Amongst centaurs, the rounceys are often the most respected, as it is a title earned rather than a name given. Rounceys are rangers, masters of the centaur art of of archery. Centaurs, long the masters of this long-held art, passing down their archery capability to the next generations. Those who learn, earn the name of rouncey.

system.classDetails:
Rouncey Centaur Traits

  • Compatibility: Bestial (or Hominid with Alternate Compatibility)
  • Attribute Increase: Your Dexterity increases by 1.
  • Weapon Proficiency: You have proficiency in Slingshots, Shortbows, and Longbows.
  • Armor Proficiency: You have proficiency in Light Armor.
  • Over-Draw: @Compendium[undertaking-chrystalis.abilities.S8JQ93YE6EAA2F3P]{Over-Draw}
  • Nessus’ Liver: @Compendium[undertaking-chrystalis.abilities.GL4BGAFGX1KAQI32]{Nessus Liver}
  • *Alternate Compatibility: You can choose to instead have the Hominid compatibility for the sake of mix-racing, gaining the following traits.
    • Removed Trait: You do not gain the “Nessus’ Liver” trait from this branch race.
